text: Jan Sokol (18 April 1936 - 16 February 2021) was a Czech philosopher, translator and politician. He was son of architect Jan Sokol. He was a member of parliament from 1990 to 1992. He was minister of education from January to July 1998. In 2003, he was candidate for President of the Czech Republic. He was a member of Charles University faculty. Sokol died on 16 February 2021, aged 84.Charter 77 signatory, former university rector Jan Sokol dies aged 84 ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Czech politicians Category:Czech philosophers Category:Czech translators Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths
title: Jan Sokol
